data.title: Resurrection Life Church
data.meta_description: Learn more about Resurrection Life Church by visiting our Marriage Ministry page. Resurrection Life Church is located in Cadillac, MI.
data.text:
We know how difficult it can be at times to navigate through marriage. We are excited to launch a new ministry team here at Res Life! We have team of coaches that can help encourage you and guide you forward. Because every marriage needs help, hope and healing.

“Marriage is like a game of chess, except the board is flowing water, the pieces are made of smoke and no move you make seems to have any effect on the outcome." — Jerry Seinfeld

This is the way many couples feel. But what many don’t realize is marriage is a blessing. It is a gift from God and He has given us the power and resources to have a good marriage.

We want you to know that it’s possible to have a healthy marriage. Not a perfect one but a healthy one.

Marriage looks easier on paper. The truth is it does take work. But the work can be easy and light with the right perspective, a few tools, a little elbow grease and coach to help guide you through.

Please consider meeting with one of our marriage coaches. You will be blessed.

- Pastors Dan & Emily Klotz

Click the button next to a couple's name to request an appointment.

Someone will contact you to schedule a meeting time.

Caleb and Jenna have been married 10 years. Coming from two very different backgrounds, having completely opposite personalities, and bringing baggage from their younger years, they found their first 6 years of marriage to be very difficult and almost gave up a time or two. But God!

Through mentorship, counseling, and much prayer, they have walked through years of deep healing and are beginning to experience the fullness of what God intended marriage to look like.

Caleb and Jenna have a passion to help couples work through the messy pain of marriage especially marriages that struggle in the areas of porn, infidelity, and anger.

Schedule: Thursdays or various weeknights.

Request to schedule an appointment here
